    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ZoomActions.CustomZoomAction, ZoomActions.Zoom100Action, ZoomActions.Zoom125Action, ZoomActions.Zoom150Action, ZoomActions.Zoom175Action, ZoomActions.Zoom200Action, ZoomActions.Zoom50Action, ZoomActions.Zoom75Action, ZoomActions.ZoomAutoAction

    public class AbstractZoomAction
extends EditableAction<Editable,java.lang.Void>
implements javax.swing.event.MenuListener
    This is an abstract class for zooming an automaton at some level.
    Author:
    Ming-Hsien Tsai
